name: Recipe: Boudin Noir aux Pommes
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Boudin Noir aux Pommes.

value.text: Purchase from Sanguinetti at Hotel Debord in Court of Fontaine

customize.name: Apple
customize.desc: Crisp and fragrant. Delicious raw or made into wine.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Butter
customize.desc: An extract from milk. With the appropriate application, it can bring rich aromas to even the most basic ingredients.

customize.name: Boudin Noir aux Pommes
customize.desc: A traditional Fontainian dish. Fry the apple slices and blood sausage slices separately and serve them on a plate with sauce. Judging by the name of this dish, tourists from other nations often think it should be a dessert, while Boudin Noir is actually just a name for blood sausage.
